data.title: Should We Be Concerned About Apple In 2020?
data.text: AAPL remains a stock I'd hang on to.

data.title: Apple Acquires AI Start-Up Voysis
data.text: The iPhone maker is apparently taking another crack at improving Siri's language skills.

data.title: This Is No Time to Lose Vigilance on Apple Stock
data.text:
Although the appearance of coronavirus case stabilization in New York bolstered both Apple stock and the rest of the markets, that’s not enough of a clear signal to buy with confidence.
The post This Is No Time to Lose Vigilance on Apple Stock appeared first on InvestorPlace.

data.title: Will Apple's (AAPL) Assumed NextVR Buyout Meet AR/VR Goals?
data.text: Apple (AAPL) will supposedly acquire California-based virtual reality company NextVR, which is expected to lend a huge impetus to the company's AR/VR efforts.

data.title: Counterpoint: Apple Music Hits 68 Million Paid Subscribers
data.text: The global market for music-streaming subscriptions has hit an estimated 358 million.
